globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://login.microsoftonline.com https://cdn.tailwindcss.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdn.tailwindcss.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://raonamadrid.sharepoint.com; connect-src 'self' https://graph.microsoft.com https://login.microsoftonline.com;
